histogram.name: LocalSearchService.BindIndexHasError
histogram.summary: Whether or not BindIndex calls to LocalSearchService have errors. It is reported once for every BindIndex call. Chrome OS only.

histogram.summary: Reasons why local search daily metrics were reported. Chrome OS only.

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}AddOrUpdateLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to add/update content to the index. It is reported once for every AddOrUpdate call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}Backend
histogram.summary: Type of backend requested from the Local Search Service. It is reported once at the initialization of an Index. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}ClearIndexLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to clear all content from the index. It is reported once for every ClearIndex call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}DailySearch
histogram.summary: Number of times the local search service has been requested to perform a search on a device. Reported daily. The count is accumulated through the day, spanning reboots, and sent once the system clock indicates that a full day or more has passed since the last report. If the system is suspended or off for more than a day, the current count will be reported the next time the system boots, but the skipped days will not be reported. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}DeleteLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to delete content from the index. It is reported once for every Delete call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}NumberDocuments
LocalSearchService.{IndexId}NumberResults
histogram.summary: Number of results for each successful search. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}NumberSearchPerformedDone
histogram.summary: This is recorded each time a search is successfully performed using LocalSearchService. Always records true. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}ResponseStatus
histogram.summary: Search request response status for Cros Settings. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}SearchLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to find search results. Only recorded if search response status is success, i.e. neither index nor query is empty. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}

histogram.name: LocalSearchService.{IndexId}UpdateDocumentsLatency
histogram.summary: Time taken to update contents from the index. It is reported once for every UpdateDocuments call. Chrome OS only. {IndexId}
